Html:
Hi,
I was wondering if the WPP published packages would be available in SCCM (2007R3/2012R2)?
Since I've had some problems with SCUP (System Center Update Publisher), with stuff like publishing Adobe's Updates and Shavlik SCUPdates.

Would I be able to view my WPP updates in SCCM?
SCUP sucks and WPP rocks!

Thanks,
Nikolaj

Honestly, I never used SCCM or Scup. Too much complicated to install, and far much expensive.
May be some WPP's users can answer to your question.

It seems like they get published to SCCM 2007R3, haven't tried with SCCM 2012R2 yet.
I think WPP works with SCCM 2007R3.
I guess that SCCM uses the Local Publishing API.
